title: U.S. officials keep pushing for Covid vaccinations as more transmissible delta variant gains ground
content:
1. U.S. officials keep pushing for Covid vaccinations as more transmissible delta variant gains ground  CNBC
  2. The delta variant adds a speed bump to the pandemic escape route  Yahoo! Voices
  3. Think Of Variant As 'Covid On Steroids,' Says Former WH Covid Advisor  MSNBC
  4. These communities remain at high risk for dangerous Covid-19 variants rapidly increasing in US, expert warns  CNN
  5. Delta variant brings new pandemic threat to Germany  Deutsche Welle
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 米国政府はCovidワクチンの接種を推進しているが、より感染力の強いdelta型が台頭してきている。
传染性更强的德尔塔变体获得支持，美国官员继续推动科维德疫苗接种工作
傳染性更強的德爾塔變體獲得支持，美國官員繼續推動科維德疫苗接種工作
